mapper.select: /* UserMapper.selectUserInfo */ select CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(telno), SHA2(#{encryptKey}, 256)) AS CHAR) as telno , telcom , gender , CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(brth), SHA2(#{encryptKey}, 256)) AS CHAR) as brth , ci from tb_user where CAST(AES_DECRYPT(UNHEX(telno), SHA2(#{encryptKey}, 256)) AS CHAR) = #{telno}
